about_the_game:
A visual novel about a young woman who goes out on a wild and unexpected night in a mysterious sex nightclub.

Visual Novel story description
It's been a while since you've been intimate with someone.
You're tired of spending your nights watching cheesy TV series and falling asleep with your hands in your panties.
You need to get out of the house and check out this new club your friends told you about.
While you're waiting at the bar to get someone's attention, this slutty dressed girl with purple hair sits down next to you and starts eye-f**king you.
You know she will try to hit on you, but you don't like girls.
Or do you?
Will you fall into temptation?
Who knows how the night will go on.
